roleset.name: repetition

example.name: Arg 1, because the hawkers are creating the original noise
example.text: the echoes of hawkers advertising their wares

example.name: both args
example.text: I admire his echo of FDR, as Lennon asks for a year “without any fear.”

roleset.note: Based on nouns-00080. Comparison to 'echo.01-v'. Vn class sound_existence-47.4. Framed by Katie.

roleset.name: sonogram of the heart

roles.note: Use ArgM-MNR for type of echo (ie exersize/stress). This has one arguement more than xray due to an odd patterning where the result is often present in incomplete sentences.

role.descr: subject - patient as a whole or the specific body part

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to xray.01-v. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: with arg 2
example.text: Echo today without further enlargement, 47 mm
